name: derivation
definition: A method for creating results by simple calculations from field activities, sample analyses, or sensor recordings.

name: estimation
definition: A method for creating results by rough approximation or professional judgement. This implies that it does not use an analytical or numerical model.

name: field_activity
definition: A method for creating results by performing an activity in the field at or on a sampling feature.

name: simulation
definition: A method for creating results by running an analytical or numerical model. This is generally more complex and/or more uncertain than derivations.

name: sample_analysis
definition: A method for ex situ analysis of a sample using an instrument, typically in a laboratory, for the purpose of measuring properties of a sample.

name: sensor_recording
definition: A method for creating results by automatic sensor measurements.

name: forecast
definition: A type of simulation to predict the future.
